attr.title: Mercenary Kings
attr.desc: Craft your arsenal to avenge your fallen comrades and save the world from the fearsome forces of CLAW!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam or GOG. Download the Linux version of the game. If you're on Windows and the Steam version use the Steam Depot with the following command: `download_depot 218820 218823 5041255923054087555`. Copy all the assets to roms/ports/mercenarykings/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
- Purchase the game on Steam or GOG. 
- Download the Linux version of the game. If you're on Windows and the Steam version use the Steam Depot with the following command: `download_depot 218820 218823 5041255923054087555`
- Copy all the assets to roms/ports/mercenarykings/gamedata, structured as below.

## Filetree
mercenarykings  
├── gamedata  
│   ├── Content  
│   ├── FNA.dll.config  
│   ├── Ionic.Zlib.dll  
│   ├── MercenaryKings  
│   ├── MercenaryKings.exe  
│   ├── NBug.dll  
│   ├── NLog.Retail.config  
│   ├── NLog.common.config  
│   ├── NLog.dll  
│   ├── NVorbis.dll  
│   ├── Newtonsoft.Json.dll  
│   ├── ParisEngine.dll  
│   ├── lib64  
│   ├── log.txt  
│   ├── monoconfig  
│   ├── monomachineconfig  
│   ├── run.sh  
│   └── uninstall.sh
